article_metadata.news_keywords: Steven Brill, drug, prices, huge, hike, Turing, pharmaceutical, Daraprim

og.description:
The American system of not regulating drug prices is to blame for the recent 5,000 percent hike in the cost of a 62-year-old medication, author Steven Brill tells Newsmax TV. 
 It's the system that we alone in America have. They're just taking advantage of the system, ...
